quantity on hand for Quantities on Hand by Location
section.para: To view quantities on hand (QOH) by location, select the Quantities on Hand by Location option. The following screen will appear:
When displaying QOH by location, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to display QOH for all sites.
Specify site whose QOH by location you want to display.
Specify location whose QOH you want to display. Displays QOH for selected location.
Select if you wish to list allocations (demands) for the items in the specified location.
Indicates whether location is Netable or not.
Indicates whether location is Restricted or not.
Display lists QOH by location, using the specified parameters. If Sales reservations by location has been enabled, then reservation quantities will be displayed by sales order.
